How many people are affected by mucopolysaccharidosis type VII ?,"The exact incidence of MPS VII is unknown, although it is estimated to occur in 1 in 250,000 newborns. It is one of the rarest types of mucopolysaccharidosis.",GHR,mucopolysaccharidosis type VII
